author: TechRadar India Bureau
title: Virtual museum travel is fun, informative and free
description: Being stuck indoors doesn't mean travelling should stop. Or at least that's what Google is trying.
content:
For those who are interested in ancient and modern art and different cultures of the world, Google Arts and Culture team has collaborated with thousands of museums around the world to bring their virtual tours to wherever they are now.
